=== Hoary Release Parties ===

Once HoaryHedgehog is out, there'll be loads of reasons to celebrate, no matter if you were directly involved the release process or just rejoice because the next iteration of the best Distribution is finally out.

April 8th is the date for "Hoary Hedgehog Final" and many parties will be on this date but you can pick your own date! Go ahead and put down your favorite pub, park or cafe and celebrate getting Hoary out of the door!

This page is changing frequently so check back quickly!
